title: Windows 10, keeps getting disconnected from pvp.net
body:
Well, I was silly, didn't think about possible problems league will have as a result.
I can log in
I don't know how it fares in game
All I know is that every minute or so I'm disconnected from pvp.net, and reconnect after 10-20 seconds. I miss queues as a result, miss bans and picks etc etc
Any one know a fix for this or know anything I can do other than playing on another source

replies.body:
whats IP helper do? isn't it to add IPV6 to an IPV4 connection or something like that, and PVP.net doesn't work with IPV6?

what about disabling IPV6 all together? will that help?

on an aside, i have two PC's, both running LOL. One was win 8.1 and one 7.
the same day i upgraded the 8.1 to windows 10 it started having (and ONLY the windows 10 pc) connection issues to PVP.net (also, my internet was being really funky about ping, shooting into the thousands for both of us, probably in hindsight it was windows update doing its thing)

games played fine, so long as we could find a match quickly, and pick the champs before dropouts (internet still worked on both PC's and only the windows 10 machine was d/c'ing) so it seems like a front end issue

i upgraded the other PC to windows 10 today, and the first thing that happened in LOL was a "you have been disconnected to PVP.net "

so it looks like its only a front end problem, and only with windows 10.

i've turned off IPV6 on my router, and so far its been 30 min without a DC for both pc's (they are just sitting on front screen while i get some food prepared.
its not a windows 10 only problem i have windows 7 and when i first started playing LOL the disconnected from pvp.net popped up when i looked up how to turn off ip helper it stopped

So I found something that fixed mine. I upgraded to Windows 10 and I got the exact same problem. Every few seconds I would disconnect. Well I did some research and found out Windows 10 download IP Helper on the computer and that interferes with LoL connection. So, to fix this little problem....

Go to your search bar, should be on the bottom with the Windows 10 update and search for SERVICES. Scroll down to find IP Helper (Click NAME to put in alphabetical order) and right click IP Helper and click stop. Restart your League client and everything should be fine. 

Just a reminder, when you shut off or restart your computer IP Helper will be turned back on so just remember to turn it off every time. Hope this helps.
Welcome to Windows 10, reenabling everything you disabled just to mess with you
Thanks - I just tried this and hope it helps. will let you know. I saw an option to disable it on startup. This better not flip back over..... Will follow up on both.
Had a similar problem, disabled IP Helper, no change.  Still disconnecting frequently from pvp.net, missing picks/bans, masteries/runes not saving, etc.
